name: Dice Runner (Progrstick)
description:
Roll for your life! Game:

An endless-runner game with randomly generated puzzles/obstacles where you play as a die.

Made for the 2022 GMTK Game Jam!

Credits/Sources:
  • Programming: Progrstick
  • Artist: Inner_geko 
  • Sound effects: jsfxr
  • Music: 89 Dennou Kyuusei Uranai
  • Font: Fixedsys excelsior 3.01
Controls:
  • Arrows 
  • Wasd keys
How to install:
  • Unzip the downloaded file
  • Run the EXE
  • Enjoy
